name: The Pink Guy
description:
A/D and Arrows are the movement 

Space, W, and the up arrow to Jump

This game was made for the Kindred Community Game Jam. The jam lasted 7 days and the theme was:  At the beginning, there was nothing. Hopefully, by playing the game, you can tell what I mean😁! The devlog should be out before the jam voting period ends if anyone is interested! It will be posted here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWeC9syI8sC2wTvzZ60gu0Q
